!goal: This is a free-for-all server. There is no goal other than to have fun.
!goals: This is a free-for-all server. There is no goal other than to have fun.
!help: Idle companies are cleared after 4 hours. Server resets at 4PM Australian EST.
!reset - delete your company to free up a slot
!end - how much time until the game resets
!rules: 1. Be nice & respectful of other players
3. Do not steal non-primary resources (goods, steel etc)
But most of all have fun.
